mapping

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapping.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tile class is the most basic unit of mapping.

    Each instance of the Tile class represents one tile on a TileMap. It contains the information on how to draw it, as well as whether it is passable, and how the character looks on it. It should not be used without a TileMap.

    Changes: The class now only contains required fields, and properly sets the messages for Tiles.

    Total Time Spent: 1.5 hour(s).

    Version:
    2.0.0.0
    Author:
    Lev Raizman
    See Also:
    TileMap

        private double enemyChance
